items.raw_string: Until 8 May 2016, in my capacity as Mayor of London:Chair of Transport for LondonCo-chair, Crossrail High Level ForumChair, London Crime Reduction BoardChair, London Health BoardChair, London Enterprise PanelChair of the London Infrastructure Delivery Board.I held powers and duties in respect of policing in London, which were discharged through the Mayors' Office for Policing and Crime.(Registered 06 June 2015; updated 07 June 2016)
